about_the_game:
Support the continued development of Lightyear Frontier with this optional DLC and get some in-game cosmetic goodies in return! The Pioneer Bundle includes the following:

1 Alternate Mech Skin: Show off your free spirit with a custom Pioneers’ League skin for your mech!
1 Alternate Homestead: A cozy tent for those who want to keep the camping mood as they establish their presence in the frontier.
Additional decorations: a telescope, a map table, and a foldable camping chair. These decorations will help show off your explorative spirit!

This pack will only be available during Early Access.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 460
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Low settings, 720p, 30 fps
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6600 / NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1660 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended - (High settings, 1080p, 60fps)

short_description: Lightyear Frontier is a peaceful open-world farming adventure on a planet at the far edge of the galaxy. Climb into your versatile mech and start your new home on a distant planet with up to 3 friends as you farm alien crops, build your own homestead, and explore the untamed wilderness of the world.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
